input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: 'qoola' is a portable air conditioner with premium stainless steel that will bring warm or cool sensation to your body

Tone: descriptive, friendly

Audience: everyone, all community member

features: 4 different cooling and heating modes that ca be adjusted by the user, which enables its use in all seasons. it can be adjusted from 15-45 celsius temperature.

extra advantage: the negative ions generate by 'qoola' can remove micro dust,pollen and other contaminants.
sentences: Looking for a portable air conditioner that can keep you cool or warm all year round? Look no further than 'qoola'. This premium air conditioner has 4 different cooling and heating modes that can be adjusted to your needs, making it perfect for any season. Plus, the negative ions it generates can help remove micro dust, pollen and other contaminants from the air. So don't wait any longer, order your 'qoola' air conditioner today!

'qoola' is a perfect device to keep you warm or cool in all seasons! it has 4 different modes that can be adjusted to your needs and it can be adjusted from 15-45 celsius temperature. the negative ions it generates can remove micro dust,pollen and other contaminants, making it a healthier option for you and your family.

Looking for a portable air conditioner that can keep you comfortable all year round? Look no further than 'qoola'. Our premium stainless steel air conditioner comes with four different cooling and heating modes, so you can adjust it to your needs. Plus, the negative ions it generates can remove micro dust, pollen and other contaminants from the air.
